Class ColorSensor

  • java.lang.Object
    • actions.ColorSensor

  • public class ColorSensor
extends java.lang.Object

      • getVÃ¤ri

        public int getVÃ¤ri()
        Compares detected color with reference colors and finds the closest color.
        Returns:
        Detected color as integer. RED = 0, BLACK = 1, FLOOR = 2.

      • laskeVÃ¤ri

        public double laskeVÃ¤ri(int[] referenssiVÃ¤ri,
                         int[] vÃ¤ri)
        Calculates channel differences for specific color.
        Parameters:
        referenssiVÃ¤ri - Reference color that is stored in calibration.
        vÃ¤ri - Detected color.
        Returns:
        Result of calculated channel differences. The lower the calculated value the closer it is to the reference color.
